Summary: Noticed beautiful colored round object in northern sky that took my breath.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Barboursville
There were no other sightings in Barboursville on or around March 13th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the back deck with my cousin looking at all the airline contrails and noticed an object like a half a blue marble with a blue skirt and below that was a very brilliant gold light on the left of the object pointed toward a plant that manufactures nickel metal. It was about the size of a dime when held at arms length. The object was setting perfectly still, I told my cousin about it but he could not see it because he was under a deck umbrella, I went into the house to get a camera which was just off where we were and when I got back on the deck (30 seconds)the object had disapeared. I am very convinced that there are other intellegnt alleans watching us.
